title: [A Touch of Zrenigotham Elegance]
[Akono's Magic Shoppe]
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a pearl-handled filigreed mandolin hangs on one of the blue watered silk walls.  A gilded maple cabinet sits in one corner while a series of dress mannequins rests on the mahogany floor.

Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a pearl-handled filigreed mandolin hangs on one of the blue watered silk walls.  A gilded maple cabinet sits in one corner while a series of dress mannequins rests on a glossy mahogany floor.
